item.description:
We meet at 7:00 but consider coming at 6:00 to socialize with free wine and beer (6 to 7) and passed hors d'oeuvres at the House of Blues Foundation Room monthly networking social. At 7:00 we will commandeer one of the seating areas and start our discussion / exchange, but there will be no dinner at this event. The social continues until 8:00, so there will be more free hors d'oeuvres, but you will have to buy a drink after 7:00.

Be sure to reserve directly as they only admit by prior reservation (it's a club).
RSVP by Friday March 26 to Nikki DiGuilio at 617.960.8376 or nikkidiguilio@livenation.com.
Say you are a guest of Thurman Smith (but don't mention the meetup group).

Our main topic is to swap information on Mass. races in 2010.

Thurman Smith
781-388-9386
item.how_to_find_us: I won't arrive until abouit 6:30; I look like my picture!
item.name: Monthy gathering
